website_summaries.verdict: A good option for anyone looking for a middle-of-the-road faux leather sofa option. Not too cheap or expensive.
pros: Excellent stain and mess resistance thanks to the faux leather upholstery
Gray color blends in well with a number of color combinations
cons: Limited compatibility with a majority of design styles

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased and impressed
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased and impressed, was nervous to buy a couch off Amazon! Unpacking and assembling took about 1.5 hours, and don't be surprised when you first open it thinking there are no back cushions only to discover they are zipped inside the bottom of the couch. The back is lower than I expected but the cushions Velcro on nicely. I love that the two sides of the sectional attach, and while the seat cushions are firm the back cushions make up for it. Four stars because there is a two inch slice in the leather on the back left side. Not with repacking and returning though.
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodSon

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up! 👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my sofa! It came very quickly about a week and 2 days but it was very easy to put together . It took me a hour without looking at the directions . I get a lot of compliments on it . It's so comfortable to lay and sit on and it's the perfect firm leather that does NOT take you down into the sunken place ! Loveeee it !
customer_reviews.author: monique s.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year and I loved it after easily putting it back together. However, 8 months into having it, the legs started to bend. Eventually one of the legs completely fell off. I tried to reattach but noticed the wood under the couch is cheap and not sturdy. The center wood cracked and I cannot place the legs back on because the wood that held them is cracked too. I will have to do some rebuilding work to get the couch repaired. Including purchasing better wood and drilling them into the couch. I am disappointed that the couch didn't event last a year. If you want better quality look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: suTora11444

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother%
customer_reviews.text: My initial review was not accepted because I didn't have anything nice to say but buying this sofa was a mistake. I only received a portion of the parts. No chaise, no chaise cushion, arm rest, legs and hardware were missing. The facts are facts and there is nothing else I can do but have them to pick it all back up. No replacement or additional parts. No I didn't spend a thousand dollars but the principle is, I had to wait 3 weeks for it, unbox it to get it up 2 flights of stairs just to find the sectional was missing half the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Anya L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Actually super cheap for a brand new piece, considering used items are often the same price. Came delivered to my apartment door in two giant heavy boxes - I wasn't home at the time. I was able to drag them inside, and set them up easily. All the parts and pieces come zipped inside the bottom of the couch. It's comfy and has clean lines, and is larger than I expected. That said, it won't get much wear and tear - I don't have kids or pets!
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: It does look nice, but I thought it would be more comfy
customer_reviews.text: The sofa comes in 2 boxes at different times, which is rather strange. The back cushions are all velcro pillows, which I would not have wanted. The couch has been used for a few months, but still makes a squeaking sound whenever I sit down. It does look nice, but I thought it would be more comfy. The seated part should be larger; It is not easy/comfy to lay on the couch. It is okay, but not ideal ***Edit: the wood on the inside is very cheap and thin. It snapped and is unrepairable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly nervous ordering a sofa online that I had never seen before. Worth the risk. It’s difficult in my area to find a couch that’s 109”. This one’s perfect. It’s comfortable and not too firm. Arrives in two boxes. Takes 20mins to put together alone although I suggest two people.
customer_reviews.author: Bronzedove

customer_reviews.title: This couch sits well for the price and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This couch sits well for the price and was easy to assemble. I needed something for an executive rental. My tenant had purchased one in grey so I was able to sit in it before buying. I am 5.3 so it might be a little high for me. Men will find it just right. The seats are firm but not hard. I slept on it and found it nice and firm. The removable cushions are a plus. I'm not sure how it will hold up but a very good start. The price is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quailty for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a kids game/movie room - it's surprisingly comfortable, was super easy to assemble and while we haven't had it long enough to determine quality (purchased late Nov 2018) I feel like it will hold up well with general use. Frankly, I was shocked at how comfortable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D. Beachum

customer_reviews.title: Received a terribly destroyed product.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures speak for themselves! Upon arrival, the product we received looked as though it had come from an abandoned hunted house. Will continue to update this review as I go through the process of returning the product and getting a refund. What an unfortunate situation. Deeply saddened about this because my mom still does not have a place to sit.
customer_reviews.author: andres gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After 3 year and very little use. These areas a peeling and cracking pictures attached. I have had leather couches for 10+ years with no issues. Very low quality. Do Not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: It came ripped from shipping
customer_reviews.text: The couch is ok for the price, not the best quality but if you don’t want to spend $3000 on a couch this is a good way to go. It was poorly packaged, box had no holes when it arrived but in the inside everything was loose and it arrived ripped in some parts as you can see in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty good for the money. It is comfortable and light weight. The only issue was a sewing from one of those back pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: There was a small scrape on one of the corners, and one of the brackets to hold the leg on broke before I even received the item. It is very nice for the price, I just think they could have used a little more care in shipping
customer_reviews.author: Tnrfp805

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this sofa
customer_reviews.text: Was leery about purchasing furniture on here. Loved the sofa! Arrived in 3 large boxes. Easy to get up to my 2nd floor apartment, and somewhat easy to assemble. Color was a soft medium gray. Material was soft and easy to clean. Overall comfort was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love the style of the couch
customer_reviews.text: We love the style of the couch. It arrived in two large boxes and was pretty easy to assemble. One must take into consideration that the seating is a bit firm. Some prefer this, I like a softer couch-but for the price it is gorgeous. The back cushions Velcro on, which is inconvenient since they come off easy. Still happy with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Adams

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: My product came damaged i am very unhappy with the fact that i spent this amount of money for my product to be scrapped meaning that it will not last long at all i feel like i want to return it but do not want to go through the hassle i would like at least a partial refund of some sort because it is unfair
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Teachey

customer_reviews.title: Nice sectional
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Looks modern and sleek. Comfortable. It has held up nicely since we purchased around Christmas. We even have two dogs that sleep on it often, a great dane and bulldog. For the price, this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: not because it's the best quality, but because for the price
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is exactly what I thought it would be. I gave it a 5 stars, not because it's the best quality, but because for the price, it's a great sectional. It is comfortable and somewhat plush. The size is actually much larger than expected. I’m very pleased with this sectional and have had several compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Medium comfort level but the price makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hardin

customer_reviews.title: I loveee them
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery, easy to assemble and I loveeee them, very happy with my purchase!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged in several places
customer_reviews.text: The design and comfort is good HOWEVER, the sectional AND ottoman arrived damaged in several places. I have emailed the company three times to day with no response. I would not purchase this item if you expect to receive a quality product and have good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Smolleck

customer_reviews.title: Only received half of the sectional
customer_reviews.text: Same as another customer, only received 1 of the 2 boxes. Will take 2.5 weeks to get the replacement that will hopefully come with both pieces.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It did come damaged in a tiny spot. The box was ripped in and a little scratch on the top
customer_reviews.author: Christina silva

customer_reviews.title: ONLY HALF A COUCH CAME! BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I WISH I COULD GIVE THIS 0 STARS---ONLY HALF A COUCH CAME! NO NUMBER TO CALL TO FIX THIS--NO E-MAIL THAT ACTUALLY WORKS...PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS COUCH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it used - was busted and unable to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this used in “Very good condition” once I received it, “damaged” was written on the box and the corner was busted to the point I couldn’t assemble it at all. I didn’t expect it to be perfect, since it was used — but I did think it would at least be usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great, however still missing half the couch
customer_reviews.text: Still missing the back to thof couch, I’ve tried contacting both amazon and the actual vendor and no one has provided any feedback.
customer_reviews.author: dayna

customer_reviews.title: Sofa broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sofa 19 months ago. The frame in the chaise broke in two. This is with normal use, only two people in the house. Of course it only has a year warranty. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: TJ  Wall

customer_reviews.title: Sexy sectional
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is beautiful, esp the gray! Fits nice in my small area. No problems with anything.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Not to buy on line
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to have more than the bottom cushions, like THE WHOLE FREAKN COUCH.
customer_reviews.author: dino redd

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the low price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful couch ! Does not look or feel cheap. It’s sturdy and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this piece
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece! Its so pretty and sturdy for the price. Not hard to assemble. Arrived just in time for Christmas holidays.
customer_reviews.author: ms cookie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great couch, easy to put together, and very comfortable. Probably the best bargain I have bought all year.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Although there are some tears in this sectional required for assembly, I did notice a couple of minor defects (rips; loose threads) but in areas which are not easily seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Homelegance Barrington 109" x 108" PU Leather Chaise Sofa, Gray
product_meta.description: Style Name:Sectional Sofa (Only)| Color:GrayClassic L- shaped sectional sofa equipped with a much sought after chaise lounger feature for ultimate comfort and relaxation piece for you and the family to enjoy. This collection is offered in 3 colors: Gray, Black, Brown. Matching Ottoman (B01MZXCDIX) is also available
feature_bullets: Contemporary style Chaise Sofa covered in easy to clean bi-cast vinyl (faux leather)
Features button tufted cushion and Chrome finished metal legs
No sag seat construction and foam padded cushion for long lasting comfort
Durable solid wood frame can accommodate weight up to 500LBS

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars71 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
